title: Tropical Fruit Farm Harvest -Amazing Agriculture Technology #Fruits Tik Tok. #Shorts

subtasks: Identify the crop to be loaded
Walk to the area where the crop is harvested
Bend down or stoop to pick up the crop
Place the harvested crop into the wagon
Secure the crop in the wagon to prevent spillage
Approach the combine harvester
Enter the combine harvester and start the engine
Adjust the combine settings for the current crop type
Attach the combine to the appropriate header
Drive the combine through the field, cutting the crop
Collect and handle crop residue appropriately
Assemble the planter and load it with seeds
Couple the planter to the tractor
Set the planting depth and spacing according to crop requirements
Drive the tractor through the fields, ensuring proper seeding
Monitor the planting progress and make necessary adjustments
Walk through the crops to check for signs of infestation
Identify specific areas with potential issues
Use tools or equipment to sample or treat affected areas

tasks.task: Drive a tractor through a field
subtasks: Position the tractor in the field
Accelerate and steer the tractor along the intended path
Maintain a steady speed and distance between rows
Adjust direction as needed to complete the field
